definition: positive (in its effect)/leading to good consequences/virtuous/(medicine) benign (tumor etc)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: zai4 sheng1 bu4 liang2 xing4 pin2 xue4

sentences.english: Schwannomas and neurofibromas are benign lesions that are thought to arise from neoplastic transformation of nerve sheath cells.
sentences.chinese: 前两者是良性肿瘤，一般认为来自神经鞘细胞的瘤变。

sentences.english: Myositis ossificans is a benign condition of heterotopic bone formation.
sentences.chinese: 骨化性肌炎是骨头异位性形成的一个良性情况。

sentences.english: So a benign cycle, makes, the scale benefits.
sentences.chinese: 以致形成良性循环，薄利多销，向规模要效益。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effective therapy of benign adnexa cyst.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨附件良性囊肿的有效治疗方法。

sentences.english: It is inter-dynamic that the developed country has already formed the supplementary pension and capital market.
sentences.chinese: 发达国家已经形成了企业年金与资本市场的良性互动。

sentences.english: The treatment of benign giant cell tumors is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 良性巨细胞瘤的治疗争议比较大。

sentences.english: To study the occurrence of primary liver cancer (PLC) among benignant hepatism patients with AFP rise.
sentences.chinese: 探讨AFP升高的良性肝病患者原发性肝癌发生率。

sentences.english: A histiocytoma in the dog is a benign tumor.
sentences.chinese: 犬的组织细胞瘤是一种良性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Smooth, well-demarcated lumps are usually benign.
sentences.chinese: 光滑，界限清楚的肿块通常是良性的。

sentences.english: Plasma cell granuloma is a rare tumor-like benign lesion of uncertain etiology.
sentences.chinese: 浆细胞肉芽肿是一种外表类似肿瘤的良性病灶。

sentences.english: The famous-brand product of Leye organic thorny pear shall be found to promote production development well. 5.
sentences.chinese: 创立乐业“名牌”有机刺梨，促进生产良性发展。

sentences.english: To provide a new thought to study on morphology of nevus .
sentences.chinese: 为研究皮肤良性肿瘤的形态学提供一种新的思路。

sentences.english: In short, both benign and malignant-tumors originate from the epithelial tissue.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤的组织发生无论良性或恶性大多均来自上皮组织。

sentences.english: Conclusion SEMT can be used to predict the benign and invasive hydatidiform moles.
sentences.chinese: 结论扫描电镜技术可用于预测良性与侵蚀性葡萄胎。

sentences.english: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV) is the most frequent vestibular disorder.
sentences.chinese: 良性阵发性体位性眩晕是最常见的前庭病症。

definition: to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
mutually related karma (idiom); fates are intertwined/interdependent
profitable to both sides/a win-win situation
